name: Normal
description: Left foot on board roughly at the center, right foot pushing forward, resting on the tail of the board while off the ground

name: Fakie
description: Feet positioned like in Normal, but now board moves in the oposite direction, making the `tail` in normal now the nose or front

name: Switch
description: Right foot on board roughly at the center, left foot pushing forward, resting on the tail of the board while off the ground

name: Nollie
description: Feet positioned like in Switch, but now board moves in the opposite direction, making the `tail` in Switch to the nose
